contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox figure skater |name= Xu Jiankun |image= |caption= |country= {{CHN}} |birth_date= {{Birth date and age|1986|10|8}} |residence= |height= 183 cm |partner= '''[[Li Jiaqi]]''' |coach= [[Yao Bin]] |formercoach= |choreographer=[[Wei Liu]] |formerchoreographer= |skating club= |retired= |combined total= 144.53 |combined date= [[2008 4CC]] |SP score= 53.26 |SP date= [[2008 4CC]] |FS score= 91.91 |FS date= [[2006 4CC]] |medaltemplates= <!-- see [[Template:MedalRelatedTemplates]] --> {{MedalCountry|{{CHN}}}} {{MedalSport | Pairs' [[Figure skating]]}} {{MedalCompetition|[[Asian Winter Games]]|Pairs}} {{MedalBronze|[[2003 Asian Winter Games|2003 Aomori]]|Pairs}} }} {{Chinese name|[[Xu (surname)|Xu]]}} '''Xu Jiankun''' ({{zh|c=徐健焜|p=Xú Jiànkūn}}; born October 8, 1986 in [[Changchun]], [[Jilin]]) is a [[China|Chinese]] [[pair skating|pair skater]]. The two are the 2006 Chinese national bronze medalists. They placed seventh at the 2006 [[Four Continents Championships]]. ==Competitive highlights (with Li Jiaqi)== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event ! 2004-05 ! 2005-06 ! 2006-07 ! 2007-08 ! 2008-09 |- | [[World Junior Figure Skating Championships|World Junior Championships]] || || || align="center" | 10th || || |- | [[Four Continents Figure Skating Championships|Four Continents Championships]] || || align="center" | 7th || || align="center" | 6th || |- | [[Chinese Figure Skating Championships|Chinese Championships]] || align="center" |5th ||align="center" bgcolor="#cc9966" | 3rd || align="center" bgcolor="silver" | 2nd || align="center" bgcolor="#cc9966" | 3rd || |- | [[Asian Winter Games]] || || || align="center" bgcolor="#cc9966" | 3rd || || |- | [[Cup of China]] || || ||align="center" | 7th || align="center" | 5th || |- | [[NHK Trophy]] || || || || align="center" | 6th || |- | [[Trophée Eric Bompard]] || || ||align="center" | 5th || || |- | [[Figure skating at the Winter Universiade|Winter Universiade]] || || || || || align="center" | 4th |- |} ==External links== * {{isu name | id=00008812 | name=Xu Jiankun}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Xu, Jiankun | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese figure skater | DATE OF BIRTH =October 8, 1986 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xu, Jiankun}} [[Category:1986 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Chinese pair skaters]] [[Category:People from Changchun]] [[Category:Sportspeople from Jilin]] {{PRChina-figure-skating-bio-stub}}
